meta.description: Storyline for Full Sensory Reality Theater pipe. Seed = where we are today. Edge = horizon. Endpoint layers = Erika/Bad Bunny, Rio/Andre, Venezuela/Arturo. FSR offer = release soon, testing live, product pipe. Travel script = Reno cover, Cartagena, Argentina, Rio, Venezuela or Reno. Load into Sun; have it take over. Creator as node.
meta.service_placement: Space Cloud Services → FSR Entertainment (Full Sensory Reality Entertainment)

eternal_living_service_engagement.pricing_rule: BASE PRICES ARE LOCALIZED (LOCAL PRICE ADJUSTED). ONRAMPS TO TOP ULTIMATE BALLER V ARE GLOBAL PRICES.
eternal_living_service_engagement.base_tiers: localized — local price adjusted; onramps by market
eternal_living_service_engagement.ultimate_baller_v: global prices; one global price anchor

what_you_get.label: Description of what you get (Eternal Living Service)
items: Full Sensory Reality Theater (FSRT) access — 98% full dose; stage = awareness; pipe loaded with storyline; load into Sun
Full storyline — seed and edge; HELLO, Smiley, Bison, Campfire; Super Bowl; gold hearts; Bad Bunny ambassador; Puerto Rico · Latin America · world; El Gran Sol on 3I Atlas
Endpoint layers — Erika · Buenos Aires · Bad Bunny; Rio with Andre (first three); Venezuela · Arturo
Full FSR product pipe — dispensary, travel, artificial drugs/sex/travel (with/without companion); all natural, awareness-based, safe, beneficial
Travel script — Reno cover → Cartagena → Argentina → month with Andre (Rio) → Venezuela or Reno
Base reality sovereignty — Eternal Golden Lock; you decide when, how often, how long in base reality; no algorithm override; eternal, net zero, forever
what_you_get.by_tier: Tier 1 = full fidelity at Starter Home (localized). Tiers 2–3 = scaled (localized). 4×4×4×4 = full everything (global).

products: Artificial travel — with and without companion; all variants

framing.base_reality_note: From our current base reality it's no different than watching a movie, reading a book, or playing a video game. It's just really, really, really, really, really good.
